participant_1.background:
I am currently unemployed so i have time to write.
I am a profesional translator.
I am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
I want to become an author.

participant_2.background:
I have a poster of neil tyson degrasse on my wall.
My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
I want to be an astronaut when i grow up.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, learn about science and space, and play with my dogs.
Wow, that's awesome! I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I love reading science fiction and fantasy novels. I also like nonfiction books about space and astronomy.
Me too! I'm a huge fan of sci-fi and fantasy. I love the way they can transport me to another world.
I know what you mean! I love being able to escape reality for a while and just get lost in a good book.
Me too! So, what's your favorite sci-fi or fantasy book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But one of my favorites is "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" by Douglas Adams.
I love that book! It's so funny and clever.
I know, right? It's one of my favorite books ever.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be an astronaut! I've always been fascinated by space and I love the idea of exploring it.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make a great astronaut.
So, what do you think your dogs think of you?
I think they think I'm the best person in the world! They love to play with me and they're always so happy to see me.
I'm sure they do! They're lucky to have you.
I'm the lucky one! They make my life so much better.
